titleStmt.title: Englands royal renown, in the coronation of our gracious soveraign King James the 2d. and his Royal Consort Queen Mary, who were both crowned at Westminster, the twenty third of April, 1685. To the tune of, The cannons roar. Entred according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guiltspur-Street, without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in Guiltspur-Street, without Newgate
